A

actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class view.Board
this will essentially call for the repainting or refreshing of the whole game every tick.

B

background - Static variable in class view.Game
holds the game background sound
Background - Class in control
A class to load and set the underlying map/game background
Background() - Constructor for class control.Background
A constructor for the class that builds the map.
Board - Class in view
A class for the main game loop.
Board() - Constructor for class view.Board
A constructor for the class that sets the game board and everything in it.
Boardstatus - Static variable in class control.Background
represents the actual map in a 2D array where each digit corresponds to a specific tile image, 0 for grass e.t.c.
bonusSpawn() - Static method in class control.Background
spawn bonus (used in Player.java)

This is called in the board repaint method.

This is called in the board repaint method.
